name: VETERINARY PHARMACIES OF AMERICA, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Legislation affecting the operation of compounding pharmacies and the availability of compounded medications. H.R. 2871, Patient Access to Compounded Medications Act of 2017.
Appropriations to fund the FDA implementation of compounding pharmacy regulations; H.R. 1625, Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2018.
